name: CartDNA's Klarna payments via Stripe Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: CartDNA

sections.description:
Integrate Klarna Payments by Stripe with WooCommerce WordPress store

This Plugin adds Klarna payments by stripe as a payment gateway for WooCommerce.

You must have an active Stripe account with enabled Klarna payments to use our plugin.

It uses the redirect method. SSL is not mandatory.

Main features

  • All Klarna Payment options available (Klarna Pay Now, Klarna Pay Later, Klarna Slice it) based on country available payment option can differ.

  • U.S. users can accept payments from U.S. customers, and European users can accept payments from European buyers. The payment options that Klarna offer are based on the customer’s location. The table below shows payment options available to customers by country.

  • Available PURCHASE COUNTRY Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, United States.

short_description: Donate link: Tags: Klarna by Stripe, Klarna Payments, Klarna Payment Gateway Requires at least: 5.0 Tested up to: 5.7.2 Stable tag: 1.
